title: SCP-3448

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose to Die during the day. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Die at night.
- While dead, all other dead players gain the ability to use their abililities and attributes again, but only on other dead players. Any deaths (of the dead players) that occur during this time will instead bring the player back to life. Players may not self-target an attack if they normally are able to.
- If you are killed while dead, no dead players will be revived and no live players will die that night. You will then actually die.
- Living players may still target you while you are dead.
- If you survive being dead for a night, you return to life.
